application.doc: Updating an existing FSSO configuration file

method.name: PUT
method.id: Update an existing FSSO configuration file
method.doc: To update an existing FSSO configuration file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the FSSO Configuration File resource URI Note: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: fsso_config_data
param.doc: The data that is saved into the existing FSSO configuration file.

param.name: fsso_config_file
param.doc: The file that contains the data to be saved into the existing FSSO configuration file, passed as application/octet-stream.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
